I know some people are iffy about the whole shota thing but until you do what they did and go from reading lewd doujins to going to the park in hopes of doing it with some kid in real life then I don't see what's wrong with reading stuff like this (unless the story is based on something IRL like that "Secret of Christopher Robin", holy fuck that killed my vibe) is it taboo? Yeah, but so are like, half the freaking tabs here. I'm not into scat or trampling but if you like reading that stuff power too you, it's only when you bring your desires in real life that you cross the line.

Least that's what I think personally, I know it's a sensitive topic & opinions differ.

Though I am kinda happy the two girls became friends again, that was sweet. And everyone bonded... With sex, strange but it's a happy ending.

Art is 10/10 as always with any Agata manga, but the story in my opinion just hits me with a solid 2/5. It just feels like this doujin is Agata returning after a 10-year hiatus and he forgot what made his doujin stories so great, the taboo incest stories were amazing it focused on both the females and the shotas. Making it easier to do a self-insert because Agata actually cared to have the shota have character. With this story, it mainly focuses on the 2 high school girls obsession with oneshota, and when they actually have sex with a shota it seemed like it just turned them into average hentai cum dumpsters you would see in a animated hentai. In my opinion, that whole cum dumpster narrative with agata doesn't mix so well, unlike Agata's last mangas where he focused mainly on the sexual bond between son/bro with mom/sister. Even though I didn't like this manga, I still hope to see more from agata.
